long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your learning experience with QuizTube, the ultimate Chrome extension for interactive learning! 

QuizTube allows you to upload custom quiz questions and be quizzed while watching any video.
Set your preferred number of questions and intervals, and QuizTube will seamlessly integrate quizzes into your viewing session, enhancing engagement and retention. Whether you're studying for exams, learning a new topic, or simply testing your knowledge, QuizTube makes it fun and easy. 
Elevate your learning with QuizTube today!
